item.title: No title
item.description: Together, Irina, Galina, and Rona have combined their skills and experience, and created a unique method for working with children as young as two-and-a-half years old. Proven effective, this method assists children in gaining control over their body, prepares them mentally, as well as physically, for ballet classes, and allows children to enter the world of ballet through their imagination.
